column1: Smoque BBQ////It's much better Memphis-style dry-rub barbecue than I'm used to
column2: but if you're more into Kansas City barbecue (where the sauce is the boss)
column3: I think there are better alternatives. Seating was very tight
column4: but tables opened up pretty quickly. Portions were very small. A "full" rack of ribs
column6: and a drink was borderline enough for me (I weigh 125 pounds) and God help you if you get the 1/2 rack. At around $25
column7: it was too expensive for the portion size.
